description: Once a proud member of an elite battalion, the Exiled Footsoldier now wanders the wilds, clad in tattered armor. Haunted by betrayal and driven by a desire for vengeance, they have honed their survival skills and will fight fiercely against anyone they perceive as a threat.

traits.name: Survivor
traits.description: The Exiled Footsoldier has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.
